## Source: amazon-inspector (7ba081e2ca3fffe519e73fc13330df7332fbaf118aa8f6c193b43e9b2ce8a5ce)
The package fdir1 was found to contain malicious code.

## Source: ossf-package-analysis (8f5aefdb4168145eaa4b092c9e5f4fbd482f9fbd1fc0328b3272f3e2067731e8)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'fdir1' @ 99.99.2 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
